name: MineDrill Redux (itch)
description:
Drill, craft, upgrade and explore in MIneDrill Redux!

After a disastrous rocket crash, drill down the earth to find ores that will help you rebuild your rocket and fly back home. 

Features:

  • 12 types of ores to mine
  • Crafting system
  • Randomly generated worlds
  • Drill upgrades based on items
  • 3 types of enemies
  • Treasures and caves

Upcoming full controller support, objectives and more.
